channel.title: Last-updated plugin change log
channel.description: Most recent changes to timestamp pluging for Sketch

item.title: Version 1.1
item.description: - Updates the placeholders when saving the document. This makes selecting stuff much faster. - Now the correct month number is used in month-placeholders

item.title: Version 0.1
item.description: Add placeholders in your Sketch file that will automatically be filled with last-updated metadata. Supports metadata like time/date, increment, version image.
